Fishing Tutorial:
Bring the catch to the Fishermen's Guild to get useful items in return.
Ugly Fish and Agile Fish can be exchanged for Stew, Transformation Scroll, Weapon Treatment Stone.
If you are caught Strong Fish, can exchange it for Head Cleaning, Chest of the Run or at Elsium Powder. Besides, fish can be sold in Shop
If you receive Elsium Powder, the Fishing Guild will teach you how to use it. Decide for yourself what to do with the fish caught!
